subject: Steroids
Swimming
lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia, Saturday, March 31 — Swimming’s world governing body, FINA, confirmed Saturday in a statement that it had filed a legal appeal to a test conducted by the Australian Sports Anti-Doping Authority, but it did not confirm that the athlete tested was the recently retired Australian star Ian Thorpe.
